useCase.name: Add New Room Category
useCase.description: Allows the Admin user to add a new room category

failureEndConditions.condition: Room category could not be added

useCase.trigger: User requests to add a new room category

mainSequence.step: Admin requests to add a new room category through the UI
UI shows the add room category form
Admin submits new room category data through the UI
Room category is successfully added and confirmation message is displayed to the Admin
